data.quote: When the bird is alive, it eats ants; when the bird has died, ants eat it. One tree can be made into a million matchsticks, but only one matchstick is needed to burn a million trees. Circumstances can change at any time; you may be powerful today, but time is more powerful than you.
A pen isn't mightier than a sword. Pens do not do battle, nor swords poetry. Mighty is the hand that knows when to pick up the pen, or pick up the sword.
data.author: Wiegraf Folles

data.quote: And all of a sudden, in a moment of complete absurd randomness, there is clarity.
